Name: Thunder Beast Ultra 5 Sound Suppressor
Description: Ultra 5 sound suppressor designed for use with a 7.62x51 NATO, but also functions as a superb multi-caliber suppressor for multiple hosts, providing excellent performance on 7.62 NATO, .300 AAC, 6.8 SPC, 6.5, and 5.56mm NATO. Can only be installed on compatible muzzle devices made by Thunder Beast.
